newsitem.title: USA: Badger Meter votes two-for-one stock split.
newsitem.headline: Badger Meter votes two-for-one stock split.

text.p: Badger Meter Inc said Friday its directors voted a two-for-one stock split in the form of a 100 percent stock dividend on common and class B common stock.
The stock dividend is payable on April 18 to shareholders of record on March 27.
As of December 31, Badger Meter 1,213,188 common shares and 562,785 class B common shares outstanding. The class B common stock is not publicly traded.

In other action, Badger Meter said its board approved payment of a regular quarterly dividend of $0.22 a share to shareholders of common stock, and $0.20 a share to shareholders of class B common stock. The dividends are payable March 14, to holders of record February 28. These are the same amounts voted in the previous quarter.
Badger Meter markets and makes products using flow measurement and control technology for industrial and utility markets worldwide.
